dc:title: On Pilgrimage - January 1975
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes time spent at the beach house, and a retreat at Corpus Christi Monastery. Eulogizes two long-time Catholic Workers, Julia Porcelli Moran and Jim Rogan, who recently had died.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 546 1975-01-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
